title: Act of God
description:
The gang finds out the Bonnaroo Festival is completely cancelled due to flooding and friend of the show Ari Shaffir is down in Tennessee picking up his RV as the news comes in. A video of two Brits fighting in an alley gets the gang all goosed up! 

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire 

Follow us on all social media @TheBonfireXM 

@DanSoder www.DanSoder.com 

@BigJayOakerson www.BigJayComedy.com
